title: Workshop for Pre-Service Teachers: Enhancing Competencies in Classroom Video Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of basic educational theories and general teaching-learning processes
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-based limited-technology environments, combining offline workshops with online discussions in a blended format.

learning_goals: Participants can observe teacher-student interactions by classroom video analysis and apply three or more cognitive/contextual reflection strategies per instructional context
Participants can propose one or more alternative instructional designs addressing real classroom problems through video-based project implementation
Participants can structure and share video analysis results in documented form based on peer feedback and self-reflection

resources: Classroom Video Library Accessible via Smartphone
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
